title: Ultimate UFC Dataset
subtitle: Merging All Kaggle Public UFC Datasets
description:
## Project Title

Tiger Millionaire - UFC Fight Predictor

[Full Documentation in the Wiki](https://github.com/shortlikeafox/tiger-millionaire/wiki)

## Description

The goal of this project is to maintain the most complete UFC database that includes the following data sources:

* [ufcstats.com](http://ufcstats.com/statistics/events/completed) - (bout and fighter statistics)
* [bestfightodds.com](https://www.bestfightodds.com/) -  (odds)
* [kaggle.com/martj42/ufc-rankings](https://www.kaggle.com/martj42/ufc-rankings) - (ufc rankings)

## Getting Started

[Start with the Wiki](https://github.com/shortlikeafox/tiger-millionaire/wiki)

Or go join a contest....

## Contest

For every UFC event there will be a betting contest where users can train models to predict profitable bets (or just manually pick!). More details here: [UFC Contest](https://www.kaggle.com/mdabbert/ultimate-ufc-dataset/tasks?taskId=4905)

## Authors

Matt Dabbert
[On GitHub](https://github.com/shortlikeafox)
